<doc> TRACE -- The simple Hop server-side tracing facility

== Description ==

This simple weblet displays client messages on the server console. It may
be used for simplistic debugging tasks.

== Synopsis ==

=== Services ===

TRACE defines one service:

  - ++[[trace]]++: This is the only entry point. This function displays on
 the server console the arguments it receives from the client.

=== Client ===

  (trace args ...)

== Client Definitions ==

=== ++(trace args ...)++ ===
<procedure> trace

<arguments>
^  arguments  ^   type   ^   description           ^
| args        |    _     | Optionals arguments.    |
</arguments>

The function ++trace++ invokes the ++trace++ service which display its
arguments on the server console.
</function>

== See also ==

<see-also>trace</see-also>


</doc>
